title: Google weather app rearranged home screen and app screen. I can't reset anything. Help please
content: I install the weather app and it totally took control and rearranged the home screen and app screen. It removed all of my apps from the home screen and replaced the app screen with a different apps screen with a section across the top for other suggested apps . There is a weather screen to the Left of the home screen that I can't change or remove.
